item.title: Vilakku Pooja
item.description: Please note that no one will be allowed to join the pooja or visit the koil on August 14th in the evening Register for Online Vilakku Puja. Cost will be $15 for each participating person. Please add each participant detail and then add them to the cart. After all participants are added, then proceed to "Checkout via PayPal" link below. If you are signing up for multiple members in your household, enter the same email-address.
